bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Letter Symbols for Quantities Used in Electrical Science and Electrical Engineering
IEEE Standard Letter Symbols for Quantities Used in Electrical Science and Electrical Engineering

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Letter symbols used to represent physical quantities in the field of electrical science and electrical engineering are defined. The symbols are independent of the units employed or special values assigned. Also included are selected symbols for mathematics and for physical constants.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
